website_summaries.verdict: A great primer to help minimize signs of aging that can be used by those with oily skin.
pros: Contains alguronic and salicylic acids to increase firmness and smooth skin's texture
Helps minimize pores, fine lines, and wrinkles
Creates a satiny finish and helps makeup last all day
cons: Might not be ideal for those with extremely oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Great non comedogenic primer!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this non comedogenic primer for one week now and am loving it. I am 56 years old with combination skin. I had no idea that the primers I had been using were not non comedogenic. I get congested pores, especially on my T zone. The primer lays down nicely and looks great under my foundation. I will be repurchasing this again. It really it a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Loving 50 and Beyond

customer_reviews.title: Great primer
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for over a year and have repurchased several times since I love it so much. Smoothes out skin for foundation application and is light, not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy S.

customer_reviews.title: ... have used this product for a few years and love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for a few years and love it.
customer_reviews.author: ELAINE BONDY

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic primer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic primer. It's moisturizing and I instantly saw an incredible difference to my make-up application after using it! The scent isn't so great when you first pump it out, but that quickly goes away once you rub the product into the skin. I cleaned my face, applied moisturizer first as suggested on the primer bottle, and then waited till it dried before I applied the primer itself. Then I waited again (as suggested on bottle) for that to dry before applying make-up. It brightened up my face, moisturized and visibly primed my skin for make-up instantly. I'm really impressed with this product and the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: Like the product a lot
customer_reviews.text: Like the product a lot, but do not like that I can't see how much is in the bottle and can't get lid off to use all that is left. For the price, should have lasted longer. Not sure I will order again until packaging has changed.
customer_reviews.author: Toni

customer_reviews.title: Stays Put
customer_reviews.text: It helps my make up stay on longer and I have a smooth finish on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Love the product but the pump bottle was broken when ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the product but the pump bottle was broken when I received it so I have to use a Q-tip to get it out of the bottle. I will buy again and hopefully that won't be an issue again.
customer_reviews.author: June Mills

customer_reviews.title: Be careful and watch for skin problems
customer_reviews.text: Tried using this and it is AWFUL, does not do what it claims and I kept getting a rash, I kept thinking it couldn't be the problem but after stopping my use the rash cleared up, I have dry skin and am 50+, I do not have sensitive skin, but for some reason my skin did not like this product, due to it being a 3rd party seller I was unable to return it as I was on vacation when packaged arrived and didn't use it right away. Not good that the return policy is so strict. I normally would have returned it within the time frame, but oh well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I bought this a while back and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I bought this a while back and finally started to use it and let me tell you, so easy to apply my makeup last longer and locks flawless, it helps my wrinkles around my eyes and lips, it's just amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Clary

customer_reviews.title: Best Pore Corrector Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I could hardly believe my eyes! My skin was so much smoother, immediately! I have been using use other Algenist products, since I really did see them on Dr. Oz, a couple of years ago. I like them all, very much.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Niblock

product_meta.title: Algenist PERFECT Pore Corrector Anti-Aging Primer - Helps Improve Skin Texture & Tone with Satin-Soft Finish Before Makeup Application - Non-Comedogenic & Hypoallergenic Skincare (30ml / 1oz)
product_meta.description: Pore corrector anti-aging primer by algenist for women 1 oz primer.
feature_bullets: Pore Refining Makeup Primer - This anti-aging primer visibly refines pores, blurs fine lines and imperfections, and helps improve skin texture and tone.*
Lightweight, Soft Satin Finish - The aqueous formula evenly distributes onto the skin, creating a satin-soft finish for smooth, long-lasting makeup application.*

Patented Anti-Aging Breakthrough - Our exclusive star ingredient, Alguronic Acid from algae, is proven to visibly minimize appearance of fine lines and wrinkles, as well as boost benefits of other active ingredients.*
Salicylic Acid and Botanicals - Includes seven additional powerful ingredients like salicylic acid, willow bark, hibiscus flower extract, and squalane.
Clean and Hypoallergenic - Dermatologist tested, non-comedogenic, and suitable for all skin types. Contains no parabens, mineral oil, Phthalates, Formaldehyde, Paraffins or sulfates.
